item.description:
We are organizing two additional New Year's Parties for the members of Growing Well Program (GWP, http://www.meetup.com/GrowingWell/). All who have not seen our program, but might be interested in joining us are welcome to come to meet with us. Also, ask for a free sample class in our new session "Friendship".

 

Our program is designed for families with young children and incorporates Russian language and music curriculum. This community program have received a high recognition in just a few months. We have successfully presented two themed five-week sessions and are very excited about new upcoming session "Friendship" which will be complemented with our text brochure.

 

See http://www.meetup.com/GrowingWell/ for photos and our calendar.

 

We are looking forward to sharing terrific moments of learning and discovery with your children!

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Welcoming Winter! Supporters Appreciation Party (Russian Play Group)
